messages.message:
Hey everyone - added a PR, and marked you all to review as the updated timeout (6 hrs) depends on each of your applications in how they use the RabbitMQ for async tasks. Let me know if this does not work for you
https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/20849

hey @lydia <!subteam^SPYBRCK6X> team - was discussing Xi's comment on the PR for longer time periods internally, and learnt that we have classifier training tasks that run 12-15 hrs. Wanted to understand if that is still the case?

i am okay to extend the timeout to longer, however tasks that run this long can have issues with task consumer restarts/OOM, broker restarts etc. So wanted to make sure if classifier training is currently expected to take this long? (and also if we are considering design changes that allow to have more granular tasks/checkpoints to recover/retry)
@Kerry @Anil ^^ can you also confirm on same question on expected duration for a single task queued in RabbitMQ from flow perspective?
